meanings.definition: The amount of space between characters in a piece of text.
meanings.sent1: The letterspacings in the book were too tight, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent2: Proper letterspacings can greatly improve the readability of a document.
meanings.sent3: The funny thing about letterspacings is that they can make a big difference in how we perceive a text.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to letterspacings was like a skilled painter meticulously adjusting each brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The letterspacings in the logo were so wide that it gave the brand a modern and airy feel.

meanings.definition: The act of adjusting the spacing between letters in a word or sentence.
meanings.sent1: His letterspacings were inconsistent, causing the text to look unprofessional.
meanings.sent2: Learning about letterspacings helped her improve the overall look of her writing.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her letterspacings were so off, it looked like the words were dancing on the page.
meanings.sent4: The letterspacings in his calligraphy were so precise, it seemed as if the words were floating on air.
meanings.sent5: The graphic designer's attention to letterspacings transformed the plain text into a visually appealing masterpiece.
